reviewText: Jay did such a great job of being a young naive hero. Must have been difficult for him at his slightly older age. And then transforms to an older more experienced man. I'm no judge of song quality being quite tone deaf but I loved this whole opera. God bless Wagner! And Jay Hunter Morris! Rolls right off the tongue, doesn't it?
The DVD case shown does not match the reviews or cast. The case is for 2013 release and the review is for 1993 release I belive. Amazon need to correct the error
